body_html: Backtracking, it is probably possible to make this work, but it will require changing how .dso's are found to be more robust. (I.e. right now we use resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile which uses some absolute path).

body: Backtracking, it is probably possible to make this work, but it will require changing how .dso's are found to be more robust. (I.e. right now we use resource_loader.get_path_to_datafile which uses some absolute path).
